title: Self-Directed Learning Design to Enhance MOOC Learner Engagement

context.additional_context: Language education course for general citizens aged 40+, requiring the establishment of self-directed learning environments using digital devices, emphasizing practical language skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 80% of weekly learning activities on MOOC platforms
Learners can produce meaningful interaction records through peer feedback activities at least three times
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans using digital portfolios and revise them at least twice
Learners can submit language learning projects (presentations/content creation) with a completion rate of over 90%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
